ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Melody of Ervaj
ygData.msgSnippet: Drops frequently in PoG.  You can also get it off the 4 Crystalline Shardwurms and the matriarch broodmother in GD (for an easy fight for a small group). Mike
ygData.messageBody:
Drops frequently in PoG. You can also get it off the 4 Crystalline
Shardwurms and the matriarch broodmother in GD (for an easy fight for a
small group).

Mike Mott
